note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
This is a redesigned interface for WebAuction+. WebAuction+ is based off of WebAuction.

# Install
1. First, download the [latest web files](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/webauctionplusplus/files/) and the [latest JAR file](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/webauctionplus/files/12-web-auction-plus-1-1-7/).
2. Next, create a MySQL database and user. 

# About
WebAuction+ has a cluttered interface, so we've made some UX changes to make it look pretty. As always, fork us and submit pull requests!

# Disclaimer
I did not make WebAuction+, and all JAR files should be downloaded from that project. These are the web server files. I would have done much more had it used the later version of jQuery. It blocked all my Javascript :(, expect more web updates later!

# Support
All problems should be filed under an issue under GitHub. Anything else should be directed to the WebAuction+ team.
name: WebAuction++
